children.text: Wart Removal in Pune - Safe, Effective, Dermatologist-Supervised Treatments with The Skin Firm
Advanced medical procedures to remove warts, prevent recurrence, and restore smooth, healthy skin under the care of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh.
What Is Wart Removal?

Warts are small, rough, skin-colored or brown growths caused by the human papillomavirus (HPV). They commonly appear on the hands, feet, face, neck, and even intimate areas. Although harmless in most cases, warts are contagious and can spread to other parts of the body or to others through direct contact. They can also cause discomfort, embarrassment, and self-consciousness especially when they occur on visible areas like the face, hands or legs. At The Skin Firm, Pune, we provide Safe Wart Removal Treatment in Pune using dermatologist-supervised, medical-grade procedures that completely eliminate warts while minimising recurrence, leaving your skin clear and smooth.
Signs & Concerns of Warts
Small, rough, raised bumps on the skin
Skin-colored, pink, brown, or grey growths
Flat warts on the face or legs
Painful plantar warts on the soles of feet
Clusters of warts in one area
Recurrent or spreading growths
Embarrassment or discomfort due tvisible location
Why Choose Wart Removal Treatment at The Skin Firm?

Warts are not just a cosmetic concern - they are viral in origin and can spread if untreated. Many people try home remedies or over-the-counter solutions, but these often fail to remove the wart completely, leading to regrowth.
At The Skin Firm, we provide:
Dermatologist-supervised care - safe, effective procedures for Wart Removal is performed by our Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh
Advanced removal methods - including laser, cryotherapy, and cauterization
Customised approach - based on wart size, type, and location
Reduced recurrence risk - by targeting the root cause effectively
Our goal is not just removal, but long-lasting relief with minimal discomfort and quick healing.
How Our Wart Removal Treatment Works
We identify the type of wart (common, plantar, flat, filiform, or genital) and assess the best treatment method.
Options may include Cryotherapy for Wart Removal in Pune, cauterisation, Laser Wart Removal in Pune, or surgical excision.
The wart is carefully removed under sterile conditions. Sessions are safe, quick, and usually painless with local anaesthesia.
We guide you with post-care to ensure smooth healing and tips to prevent recurrence.
Types of Wart Removal Treatments We Offer in Pune
precise, effective removal with minimal scarring
wart destruction using liquid nitrogen
safe removal with controlled heat
minor procedure for stubborn or larger warts
prescribed creams for selected cases
tailored approaches for recurrent or multiple warts
Benefits of Wart Removal Treatment at The Skin Firm
Complete wart removal under medical supervision
Reduced risk of recurrence compared to home remedies
Safe, quick, and minimally invasive procedures
Minimal scarring and faster healing
Relief from discomfort, pain, and embarrassment
Restores clear, smooth skin
Suitable for all ages and skin types
Downtime After Wart Removal Treatment
Minimal Downtime - most patients resume daily activities immediately
Mild Redness or Sensitivity - common for a few hours post-procedure
Small Scab Formation - may occur and fall off naturally within 7–10 days
Quick Recovery - most warts heal fully within 1–2 weeks depending on size and location
Post-Care After Wart Removal Treatment
Keep the treated area clean and dry
Avoid scratching, rubbing, or picking at the area
Apply prescribed ointments or creams as directed
Protect the skin with sunscreen if the area is exposed
Avoid swimming pools or sharing personal items until healed
Attend follow-up appointments if recommended
Why The Skin Firm is Pune's Trusted Clinic for Wart Removal Treatment

Advanced Technology - safe and effective removal methods

Patient Testimonials for Wart Removal in Pune
I had warts on my fingers for years and nothing worked. The laser wart treatment at The Skin Firm removed them completely and since then they haven't come back.
Who Can Benefit from Wart Removal Treatment?
Men & women with visible warts on the face, hands, or body
Patients with painful plantar warts on the feet
Adults with stubborn or recurrent warts
Teenagers with flat warts on the face or legs

Safe for all skin types and ages
FAQs on Wart Removal Treatment in Pune
Most warts are harmless but contagious. They can spread to other parts of the body or to others if untreated.
Yes, our advanced wart removal treatments remove warts effectively. However, since warts are viral, there's always a chance of recurrence.

items.question: Do home remedies work for warts?

children.text: Home remedies and OTC treatments rarely work and may cause scarring or infection. Professional removal is safer and more effective.
No, local anesthesia or numbing makes the procedure virtually painless.
Most warts are removed in a single session, though multiple warts may require more visits.

items.question: Will wart removal treatment leave a scar?

children.text: With advanced methods like laser therapy, scarring is minimal or barely noticeable.

items.question: Can children get wart removal treatment?

children.text: Yes, treatments are safe and effective for children, especially if warts are spreading or painful.
Healing usually takes 7-14 days, depending on the size and depth of the wart.

items.question: Can warts come back after treatment?

children.text: It's possible, since warts are caused by a virus. However, proper treatment reduces recurrence significantly.

items.question: Is wart removal safe for the face?

children.text: Yes, laser and cauterisation are precise and safe for delicate areas like the face.
